name: Sledge Hammer, 92cm
description: This Foam Latex post-apocalyptic sledge hammer can be used to fend off the relentless hordes of undead that roam about. 92cm. Realistic looking hammer featuring a blackened metal finish on the sledgehammer head with a textured foam wood finish handle.

name: Vibro Axe, 150cm
description: The Vibro Axe is the next generation of weapons that were created to annihilate the living dead. With one felled swing you can chop, hack and slash your way through the armies of the damned. A cross between the mechanical and the tradition this post-apocalyptic weapon will surely make an impression.

name: Gear Axe, 150cm
description: This maniacal weapon will create a frenzy as you wield this gear axe.  Carve your way through the bodies, every point of the gear adding more injury to your opponent. The straps help bind the weapon together, affixing the edges to the shaft. Use it in your favourite Post apocalyptic event.

name: Large Lead Pipe, 190cm
description: The large Lead Pipe is just that...a large lead pipe. How else describe something so simple. Its unsophisticated allure however is surpassed by its effectiveness in combat. This latex weapon is unmatched and gives advantage to the survivalists giving a little hell back to those undeads.

name: Stun Rod, 90cm
description: Beware of the Stun Rod! This latex weapon is equipped with a multitude of simulated props that drives your imagination. A large red button sends the current to the blades causing them to vibrate adding even more damage to the zombies, slashing and sawing through their flesh. (DOES NOT REALLY VIBRATE)

name: Nail Club, 70cm
description: Superbly cruel to use and impressive to wield this latex nail club will do massive damage to those Zombies. A nail club is a crude weapon and can be fashioned in many ways, ours is a wooden plank that has large nails protruding throughout capable or ripping flesh from bone. 70cm

name: Vibro Glaive, 190cm
description: Keep those pesty kritters and zombies at bay with this destructive latex vibro glaive. 190cm

name: Chain Sword, 100cm
description: This latex chainsword is loosely based on the warhammer space marineâ€™s chain sword and is pure fury. A sword with the action of a chainsaw on steroids, its large dinosaur teeth are capable of ripping anyone in two. 100cm.

name: Baseball Bat, 80cm
description: I know that this latex baseball bat would be the first weapon in case of a zombie home invasion. This bloodstained bat has already seen some action, the simulated aluminum finish makes you think that you can knock those brains right out just like Al Capone.

name: Tonfa, 60cm
description: Break out your zombie riot gear starting with this foam latex tonfa which looks amazingly real. Ask a cop or a karate instructor if a tofa is deadly when used right and they will both agree that this is a great for defense as well as attack. This tonfa a lacquered black finish with a handle and knob for proper control.

name: Police Baton, 56cm
description: Every Beat cop or Zombie killer needs a latex Baton to stop those bad guys in their tracks. The baton resembles a small bat and although it does not look like it, is capable of really causing some major damage.

name: Lead Pipe, 52cm
description: Any plumber can tell you how much it hurts to get whacked by a Lead Pipe, let me just say you do not want to know. This realistic latex lead pipe is safe for us but those ghouls better watch out, the threaded pipe ends will surely leave an imprint in the soft flesh.

name: Fireman Axe, 92cm
description: In the need for a realistic foam latex fireman's axe for post-apocalyptic zombie attacks or modern LARP! Protect you home from the undead using this foam latex fireman axe its realistic look can be attributed the quality paint job curved handle and accurate size.92cm

name: Vibro Hammer, 150cm
description: The Vibro Hammer is the most impressive post-apocalyptic weapon in our arsenal.  With a wide headed mace on one end and a thick axe on the other you will be ready for any undead creature you encounter.
